blogPost.excerpt: In computer science, a topological sort or topological ordering of a directed graph is a linear ordering of its vertices such that for every directed edge uv from vertex u to vertex v, u comes before v in the ordering.
blogPost.title: Topological sorting

previous.excerpt: Sun Tzu said: The art of war is of vital importance to the State. It is a matter of life and death, a road either to safety or to ruin. Hence it is a subject of inquiry which can on no account be neglected.
previous.title: Art of War

next.excerpt: Fan Tai Sui, is when there is a Fan going on with this cycle, meaning an interruption, obstacle or obstructing force that is aggressively putting resistance to the cycle, stopping you from getting your “package” from the Yuen Sun.
